name: Halo-The Mombasa Insident
description:
Hello I am doing a fan game in the same timeline of halo 2 the game is a 2d shooter like Halo zero

The story pretty basic : You are an ODST trooper sent by ONI in comparation to others ONI granted you the use of experimental shield tech
and assigned you to a squad now the final thing to do is normal routine on the Alpis space station followed by a armory check on the Scavenging Dawn frigate
Docked to the station
The game features different difficulty modes
Easy
Normal
Heoric
Legendary
Insane
Nuts
a full campaign
Feel free to play the game and leave feedback if you feel to
